subtitleName: MARKETING WEBSITE FOR CHEVROLET ELECTRIC VEHICLES
description: Chevrolet electric is a marketing website to showcase the latest electric vehicles customers can purchase or preorder from General Motors. The site was built using TypeScript, React, NextJS, and Strapi.
shortDescription: Brand sites to delight and excite prospective EV customers

images.alt: Chevrolet Electric Bolt EUV 2023 Hero section
Chevrolet Electric request information leads form

description: Ultra Compose is an initiative to build a custom website creation solution (similar to SquareSpace or Wix) designed with the General Motors business needs in mind. Built With React, TypeScript, React Query, Quarkus, and Jotai. Since it is an in-house tool I cannot provide images.  Photo above is by Ketut Subiyanto.
LSR Creative is a graphic design portfolio website I built for my wife. The website was built it using JavaScript, React, NextJS, GraphQL and GraphCMS.
shortDescription: Graphic design portfolio website built for my wife

description: Project 5 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to build an employee directory using the RandomUser Generator API, JavaScript, and AJAX.
Project 7 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to build photo gallery using the Flickr API, React, AJAX and JavaScript.

Project 10 of the Full Stack JavaScript TechDegree program offered by Team Treehouse. The assignment was to bring together everything learned throughout the program into a full stack school course app.  The app allowed users to sign up or sign in, and create, update, or delete courses. Built with React, SQL, and Express.
